K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222a-2: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222a-3: ser sna las cher lhag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222a-4: gzhan gyi la 'jur 'gegs byas pa'i nyes pa'i 'bras bu 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-0: 'phags pa moo gal gyi bu gnyis bas mtha' zhig na so sor rtog pa'i shes rab @222b yid la byed cing yod pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-1: nyi ma'i gung la gnyis pos khams gseng du mchis pa'i sa na yi dvags me lus sngo la skam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-3: skra 'dzings pa; mig dmar la mi g-yon du yo ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-4: ma mchu ring la g-yas su yo ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-6: rkang lag shin tu phra la ring ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-7: lag pa khu tshur bsdams pa'i sen mos thad kar phug nas sen mo sngo zang nge yod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-8: kha nas sgra rnam pa lnga sgrog pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-10: dgos na zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-11: med na zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-12: ma sbyin cig ces bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-13: ster na yang che ches par 'ong ngo zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-14: de tsam je ches kyis phri la byin ces bya ba dang lnga brjod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-15: skyi zing byed pa zhig dang phrad pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-16: der gang zag gnyis po des bsam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-17: dgon pa bas grong yul thag nye la zas mod pas grong khyer du phyin te bslangs pas dkar gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-20: nas kyi zan la sogs pa bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-21: btung ba mang du rnyed nas yi dvags kyi drung du khyer te phyin nas bstabs pas mi len par gong gi sgra rnam pa lnga sgrog cing bros so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:222b-22: der gang zag gnyis po des shin tu ma dga' nas yi dvags mo de'i sems su song nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-0: gzhan yid la ma dran te bcom ldan @223a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-1: 'das 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa can du de ma thag phyin te zhabs la phyag btsal bas 'khangs nas thang chad de dri ba ma spobs so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-4: dri ba yod na dbugs phyung la dris shig ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-5: bcom ldan 'das lags; bdag cag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-7: nyid la khong yus che nas 'khams pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-11: bdag cag gnyis ni bas mtha' zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas gsungs pa so sor rtog pa yid la byed pa las rgyang ring por 'chag tu phyin pa las yi dvags mo lus po sngo la skam pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-14: mig dmar la g-yon du yo ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-15: ma mchu ring la g-yas su yo ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-16: ske dang rkang lag shin tu phra la ring ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-17: lag pas khu tshur bsdams pa'i sen mos thad kar phug nas sngo bzang nge ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-18: kha nas sgra rnam pa lnga sgrog pa 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-19: dgos na zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-20: med na zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-21: ma sbyin cig ces bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223a-22: ster na yang che ches par 'ong ngo zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223b-0: de tsam je ches kyis phri la byin ces bya ba @223b dang lnga brjod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223b-1: skyi zing byed pa zhig dang phrad nas bdag cag gnyis kyis bsam pas dgon pa bas grong yul thag nye la zas mod pas grong khyer du phyin te bslangs pas dkar gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223b-3: nas kyi zan la sogs pa bza' ba dang btung ba mang du rnyed nas yi dvags mo de'i drung du khyer nas bstabs bas kha nas gong gi sgra rnam pa lnga brjod cing gang byin pa mi len par bros te thal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223b-5: 'di la sman pa'i thabs ci mchis zhu ru mchis pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223b-11: legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223b-13: lus sro la skam pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223b-14: rang gis za ma phod pa las gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223b-16: gzhan za zhing spyod pa la bdag gis ser sna byas pa las gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223b-17: yan lag phra la sor mos thad kar phug pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223b-18: gzhan la sbyin pa dag la ches kyis phri la byin ces byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223b-19: rang gis kyang spyod mi phod pa las gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223b-21: kun gyi yid du mi 'ong ba byas pa las gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:223b-23: 'dod chags kyis yongs su rgyas pa las gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-1: gzhan la bltas pa las gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-2: ma mchu ring la g-yas su yo ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-3: ster na yang ches bar 'ong ngo zhes byas pa las gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-4: kha nas sgra rnam pa lnga sgrog pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-5: byed pa rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-6: sngon brjod pa'i bag chags brtas pa las gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-7: de lta bu'i las kyi dbang gis gzhan ci byin yang phan par mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-8: chu gcig pu las rang gis sbyin nus pa ma yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-9: gzhan gyi chu la 'jur 'gegs ma byas pas da lta yang chu gtsang ma rtsam pas ma reg pa la sngags lan gcig btab ste se gol lan gcig gtogs te byin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-10: de'i rgyud grol zhing 'dod pa tshim par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-12: aom dzva la mi dam sarba pre ta bhya: sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-17: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-19: dzva la ni; 'dod pa me ltar 'bar ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-21: mi'i rgyud kyis ser sna dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-24: de lta bu'i las las gyur pa thams cad do; ;pre ta ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-25: yi dvags kyi snying po ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-26: las kyi rgyud smin pa'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224a-29: sdug bsngal byang bar bya ba'i don to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224b-0: las dang @224b sdug bsngal bkres skom byang bar gyur cig pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224b-1: da myur du song la de ltar gsos shig ces gsungs pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224b-2: de nas gnyis kyis myur du phyin nas de bzhin du bgyis pas gzod dga' nas longs spyod cing lus bag glan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224b-3: de nas chos ston la bab nas gnyis po res mos byas te sh'a ri'i bus bshos gsol nas gcig gsol du stsal te chab byin pas yang gong bzhin brjod de bros so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224b-4: yang gnyis kyis yid ma ches nas bcom ldan 'das la zhur mchis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224b-5: bcom ldan 'das lags; bdag cag gis gsungs pa bzhin bgyis lags pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224b-6: gso ru btub pa gda' ba la chos ston yol du dogs nas 'tshal nas yang sngar brjod cing bros nas yang zhu ru mchis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224b-9: khyod kyi sen bar du rtsam pa lus pas lan pa yin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224b-10: lag pa khrus la gzod byin cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224b-11: de'i drung du 'gro mi dgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224b-14: de gnyis kyis khrus bgyis te chu sbyin stsal bas yi dvags mo de nyid du 'ongs nas cung zad na mdangs dang ldan par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:224b-15: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225a-1: du yang yi dam du gyis la thong zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225a-2: gzhan la yang rgya cher spel cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225a-5: dpag tu med de tshad las 'das so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225a-6: mdo tsam brjod na 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi phyug po rnams la sbyin pa byas pa bas dbul po 'ga' zhig la sbyin pa byas na; de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225a-10: nga rgyal te dregs pa dang rgyags pas gnas ngan len spro bar byed do; ;'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbul po rnams la sbyin pa byas pa bas yi dvags 'ga' zhig la sbyin pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225a-11: de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye'o; ;de ci ste zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225a-16: yi dvags las kyis de lta bu dag ma yin gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225a-17: ma bsngos na kha ru chud kyang dug chen por 'gyur ro /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225a-18: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yi dvags la sbyin pa byas pa bas 'jur 'gegs yi dvags gcig la chub byin na; de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225a-20: yi dvags de dag la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-3: bshal bas tshim pa yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-4: las kyi rim pa bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-6: gzhan dka' ba'i las kyis sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-8: dmigs pa gzhan gyis mi thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-9: rdzas thams cad la 'thams te bkag pas rdzas gzhan mi myong /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-10: gzhan gyi chu gcig pu ma bkag pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-11: chu gtsang rtsam pas ma reg pa las dbang med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-12: rang gi rgyud zhi bar byed pa'i sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-13: phyag rgya se gol gcig min pa gzhan gang gis kyang thob par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-14: se gol gcig tu bzhag pa ce zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-15: gnyis su gyur na gzhan gyi sgrar gyur nas mi thob /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-16: des na rang gi go ba bskyed pa sgra gcig tu nges pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-18: bar chad kyis mi tshugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-21: longs spyod dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-22: yi ga 'chus pa rnams 'byed par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-23: mdangs nyams pa rnams gsal bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-24: 'di gzhan la spel nas rgyud grol nas yi dvags kyi rgyud chad de mthar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-037:225b-25: de skad ces bka' stsal nas rigs kyi bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
